column5: Thank you for sharing your story. I’m honestly crying reading this. I am almost exactly one year into my journey. I have finished DBT once and re-enrolled. I am amazed at how most days are compared to a year ago, but still struggle so much. Hearing the possibility of recovery always makes me optimistic and feel even more committed. I know it’s a long road but I’m glad it gets easier to trek.
My partner and I used that as well, and I was so grateful. If breaks my heart to have something that was so near and dear to us be dissolving.
